Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to be converted to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE before being APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for all activities following Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE until Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time to the next activity after Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to the start of the next activity in the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case
